thread.section_title: News Article Archive from M03 22, 2018 - Wsj.com
thread.title: EU Awaits Tariff Fate Ahead of U.S. Decision

author: Emre Peker
title: EU Awaits Tariff Fate Ahead of U.S. Decision
text:
BRUSSELS—European Union leaders are discussing Thursday the bloc’s response to U.S. steel and aluminum tariffs, as they hold out hopes of winning an exemption from the Trump administration that could avert a trans-Atlantic trade war
The two-day summit kicks off just hours before President Donald Trump decides on tariff waivers for U.S. trading partners. It also comes in the wake of a last-ditch effort this week by Brussels to convince Washington that the bloc should qualify for an exclusion. 
...
